articles.title: Oil tanker appears to be leaking oil following Houthi attack, says Pentagon | CNN
articles.description: According to the Pentagon, a Greek-flagged oil tanker carrying “approximately 1 million barrels of crude oil” is leaking into the Red Sea, presenting a “navigational hazard and a potential environmental catastrophe.” Yemeni Houthi rebels targeted the vessel w…

articles.author: Debora Ely
articles.title: Brazilian family left homeless by floods finds refuge under road bridge
articles.description: Four months after devastating flooding wrecked their house in southern Brazil, Milton do Nascimento and his family still have no permanent home and are sleeping rough under a highway bridge.

articles.author: ABC News
articles.title: Thousands evacuated as monsoon rains and flooding kill 28 people in India
articles.description: Almost 2,000 people have been rescued, with the army deployed to assist with relief efforts.
articles.content:
Heavy rains have battered India and Pakistan's coastal areas, flooding cities in India's Gujarat state and forcing thousands from their homes.
